tool.name: Minfi Get SNPs
tool.description: retrieve the chromosome and the position of each SNP

configfiles.configfile:
require("minfi", quietly = TRUE)
GRSet <- get(load('$grset'))
snps <- getSnpInfo(GRSet)
write.table(snps, '$table')

param.name: grset
param.label: Data Mapped To The Genome
param.help: This class (GenomicRatioSet) holds preprocessed data for Illumina methylation microarrays, mapped to a genomic location.

tool.help:
**What it does**
Minfi Get SNPs retrieves the chromosomal position of each SNP on a given Affymetrix SNP Array.
**Input information**
Input data is GenomicRatioSet class R object (i.e. generated by Minfi Map to Genome Tool) holding preprocessed data for Illumina methylation microarrays, mapped to a genomic location.
**Output information**
Minfi Get SNPs returns a table with chromosomal position of each SNP on a given Affymetrix SNP Array. ============ =========== ========= ========== =========== =========== "Probe_rs" "Probe_maf" "CpG_rs" "CpG_maf" "SBE_rs" "SBE_maf" ------------ ----------- --------- --------- ------------ ----------- "cg14057946" "rs74512038" 0.076823 NA NA NA "cg11422233" "rs74512038" 0.076823 NA NA NA "cg16047670" "rs114983708"0.115264 NA NA NA ============ =========== ========= ========== =========== ===========
